Package simple.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractOptions
    How to use: Set the default options, AbstractOptions.DEFAULTS, using either the instance block or the static block.
    App
    Provides convenience methods for applications.
    For exceptionless methods, the exception will be logged using Log.
    ArrayEnumerator<E>
    Takes an Object array and creates an enumerator from it.
    ArrayIterator<E>
    Takes an Object array and creates an iterator.
    BitArray
    This handles bits of various sizes in a boolean array.
    The array size is set when made and cannot grow or shrink.
    BlockingDeque<E>
    Blocks until the list has an item.
    BlockingQueue<E>
    Blocks until the list has an item.
    BlockingStack<E>
    Blocks until the list has an item.
    Bytes  
    CIHashtable<V>
    Hashtable that uses case insensitive keys.
    ClassExplorer
    Slightly simplifies the exploration of a class.
    do_array
    Contains useful functions pertaining to just about anything that is related to or backed by an array.

    Created: May 1, 2011
